playground.title: Playground
playground.description: Experiment with filters and AI prompts, or analyze text directly
playground.filePathHint: Enter the absolute path to a file on the server

promptManager.userPromptHint: The specific analysis or question you want answered about the filtered results.

settings.title: Settings
settings.aiEnabledHint: Use AI to analyze insight results
settings.baseURLHint: OpenAI-compatible API endpoint (e.g., Azure OpenAI, Ollama)
settings.temperatureHint: Higher values make output more random, lower more deterministic
settings.insightPathsHint: Add directories containing custom insights. Click Refresh to reload after making changes.
settings.refreshInsightsHint: Manually reload all insights from built-in and external paths
settings.themeHint: Choose your preferred color scheme. Changes apply immediately.
